body: Ugh, one of these issues again. Is it allowed? I mean, some mods have different opinions on it, but I think it is kind of in the grey area.
body_tagged: Ugh, one of these issues again. Is it allowed? I mean, some mods have different opinions on it, but I think it is kind of in the grey area.
title: Spawnkilling in Nexus - Allowed or not?

replies.body: not allowed, not fair and decreases other people's KD, I would give a warn, and then a tempban for a few hours if they continued if I were them >.>
replies.body_tagged: not allowed, not fair and decreases other people's KD, I would give a warn, and then a tempban for a few hours if they continued if I were them >.>

replies.body: not allowed. read rules. http://avicus.net/rules
replies.body_tagged: not allowed. read rules. http://avicus.net/rules

replies.body: well you cant really kill the person while they are in their spawn......
replies.body_tagged: well you cant really kill the person while they are in their spawn......
